.. inductive calibration GUI documentation master file, created by
   sphinx-quickstart on Wed Dec  1 10:50:33 2021.

   contain the root `toctree` directive.

Welcome to inductive calibration GUI's documentation!
=====================================================

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Contents:

This documentation documenents the code of the TiePieLCR multi frequency impedance analyser. The hardware for this device can be found `here <github.com/martijnschouten/tiepielcr_hardware>`_

   :members:
   :undoc-members:
   :show-inheritance:
